TopicTitle: Active flights. active bases, active structures.

Articles.Content:
I don't think bases, flags, or EVAs should be considered active flights. EVAs should only be active flights if the Kerbal is in orbit. For the rest of them, they would be "Active bases", "Active ground EVAs" and flags.

For example, if you had 4 ships, 2 stations, 7 probes, 6 bases, 3 EVAs on ground, and 1 EVA in orbit.

The 4 ships, 2 stations, 7 probes, and the EVA in orbit are all active flights, so there are 14 active flights.

The 6 bases are "Active bases"

The 3 EVAs on ground are "Active ground EVAs.

So, from the main menu, the saves would appear as

____________________________________

<Insert cheesy space program name here>

14 active flights

6 Active bases

3 active ground EVAs___________________
Simpler still would be to relabel it from flights to missions.

Simpler still would be to relabel it from flights to missions.

Give the Kadet a promotion XD. I would even simplify further though by disabling display of flags, EVAs, and bases by default, just like debris.
